comment: This is an example configuration file for Claude Desktop MCP servers
instructions: Copy this file to the appropriate location for your OS:
Then replace the placeholder values below with your actual paths

notes.command: Must point to the Python executable in your virtual environment
notes.args: Must use absolute paths to the server.py files
notes.GOOGLE_SHEETS_ID: Find this in your Google Sheet URL between /d/ and /edit
notes.GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS_PATH: Absolute path to your downloaded service account JSON file
notes.restart: After saving this config, completely restart Claude Desktop for changes to take effect
